Steve Ballmer , chief executive of Microsoft, said the partnership would dramatically accelerate the development of a vibrant and strong Windows Phone ecosystem. Nokia and Microsoft have been working on the development of the first of the new phones for two months, but it will be about a year before the new phones hit the market.

Sergio Marchionne told dealers and industry executives he believes it is important that Chrysler maintain its "American nature." That American nature needs to be preserved for its ultimate success, he said to applause. "We can open up the world to Chrysler, we can do a number of things, but I can not turn it into an Italian car company."

, effective April 4. Eric Schmidt will continue on as executive chairman, while Sergey Brin will continue on as co-founder. blog post, Eric Schmidt said the shift has been in the works for some time. Larry, Sergey Brin , and I have been talking for a long time about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making-and over the holidays we decided now was the right moment to make some changes to the way we are structured, Eric Schmidt said.
